rules.description: Disable right_option (Which is actually remapped to right command key) + Spacebar because it keeps activating ChatGPT when Im placing question marks
Finder Remap Ctrl + Shift + V to Command + Option + V to ease moving files
Excluding some apps, cursor jumping lines funcionality I do in VSCode like
Excluding some apps, ctrl + tab is tab 5x (already works for shift)
Apps Remap Ctrl + Shift + F to Command + Option + F to ease searching globally
Remap (Ctrl + F or Fn + F to Cmd + F)
Remap (Ctrl + J or Fn + J to Cmd + J)
Remap (Ctrl + L or Fn + L to Cmd + L)
Remap (Ctrl + O or Fn + O to Cmd + O)
Remap (Ctrl + P or Fn + P to Cmd + P)
Remap (Ctrl + R or Fn + R to Cmd + R)
Remap (Ctrl + S or Fn + S to Cmd + S)
Remap (Ctrl + X or Fn + X to Cmd + X)
Remap (Ctrl + SLASH or Fn + SLASH to Cmd + SLASH)
Remap (Ctrl + A or Fn + A to Cmd + A)
Remap (Ctrl + C or Fn + C to Cmd + C)
Remap (Ctrl + K or Fn + K to Cmd + K)
Remap (Ctrl + N or Fn + N to Cmd + N)
Remap (Ctrl + T or Fn + T to Cmd + T)
Remap (Ctrl + V or Fn + V to Cmd + V)
Remap (Ctrl + W or Fn + W to Cmd + W)
Remap (Ctrl + Z or Fn + Z to Cmd + Z)
Remap (Ctrl + SPACEBAR or Fn + SPACEBAR to Cmd + SPACEBAR)
Remap (Ctrl + DELETE_OR_BACKSPACE or Fn + DELETE_OR_BACKSPACE to Cmd + DELETE_OR_BACKSPACE)
Remap (Ctrl + D or Fn + D to Cmd + D)
Remap (Ctrl + E or Fn + E to Cmd + E)
Remap Ctrl/Fn + RIGHT_ARROW to Option + RIGHT_ARROW
Remap Ctrl/Fn + LEFT_ARROW to Option + LEFT_ARROW
Remap Option + C to Ctrl + C
Open iTerm
Ctrl+Shift+Esc to open task manager
Replace "" symbol with "/" that is done when we press option + w with caps lock enabled. I just want my slash everytime
